title: Train delays between Senja and Jelapang

updates.text: Trains are running slightly slower than normal due to cautious driving on wet tracks. Please allow extra time for travel.
[BPLRT] CLEARED: Train service btwn #Senja and #Jelapang are now operating normally.
[BPLRT]: Trains are slightly delayed btwn #Senja and #Jelapang via Senja. Estimated delay: 10 mins
